description: Since Packet Tracer has some issues with newer versions of Linux, particularly non-Ubuntu ones, GNS3 is great for learning on in Linux (on top of it supporting considerably more that Packet Tracer anyway). I've had some trouble getting IOU to work on gns3-server but that may be an issue on my end. This client works great at any rate.

the best helpful tool for network engineers that wants to test or preparing for any certification exams , with wide range of platforms supported regardless of abnormal behavior that occurs sometimes or underlying complexity when dealing with multiple visualization engines , Thanks for the developers and hope GNS3 community do more effort to make official support for fedora platform
el asistente no realiza una correcta instalación de la aplicación
Olvidaron mencionar que solo instala gns3 y que las demás aplicaciones como vpcs, dynamips, etc. se deben instalar por separado, para el correcto funcionamiento del programa...
